messages.message:
Maybe it has to do with this `copies lock value` error?
The timing seems to match up
https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/grafana/goto/F0MWD9EHR?orgId=1

From ChatGPT:
https://chatgpt.com/share/685efdda-5d38-8006-8a31-27f24fff8034

It says that stalled goroutines might be holding onto memory, which might explain why the duration of the grpc endpoints ranges around 70-600s
Possibly. It's funny -- I'm fixing a bunch of such warnings right now that were hidden by our bazel builds
Great!! Let's see if that'd fix the issue :woman-bowing:
